ROOT.ds354: SELECT A.RN,DECODE(B.RIS,NULL,0,B.RIS) AS RIS FROM (SELECT to_char(DATES,'dd') AS RN FROM (SELECT TO_DATE('2019-02-01 00:00:00','yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss')+level-1 AS DATES FROM DUAL CONNECT BY level <= TO_DATE('2019-02-28 23:59:59','yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss')-TO_DATE('2019-02-01 00:00:00','yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss')+1))A LEFT JOIN (SELECT to_char(RISKTIME,'dd') AS RN,SUM(FAULTRATE) AS RIS FROM MONITORSIGNAL.TRISKDEVICE WHERE RISKTIME BETWEEN TO_DATE('2019-02-01 00:00:00','yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') AND TO_DATE('2019-02-28 23:59:59','yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') AND DEVICEIDX={0} GROUP BY to_char(RISKTIME,'dd'))B ON A.RN=B.RN ORDER BY A.RN
